Name: Vardar
Description: Vardar is a region in the central part of North Macedonia, known for its wine production, historical sites, and the Vardar River.

Name: Eastern
Description: Eastern is a region of North Macedonia known for its fertile plains, natural beauty, and small towns.

Name: Southwestern
Description: Southwestern is a region located near Lake Ohrid, with a rich cultural heritage and beautiful landscapes.

Name: Pelagonia
Description: Pelagonia is a fertile region in the southwestern part of North Macedonia, known for its agriculture, especially for growing grains and vegetables.

Name: Polog
Description: Polog is a region in the northwestern part of North Macedonia, known for its mix of ethnic groups and proximity to the border with Kosovo and Albania.

Name: Northeastern
Description: Northeastern is a region in North Macedonia, known for its natural landscapes, forests, and rural areas.

Name: Western
Description: Western is a region known for its mountainous terrain, natural parks, and historical monuments.
